default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^I’m Qiwy, and this cute kitty cat is my sister Quellia.
^She’s very shy and won’t speak to you.
^We know our offer is not as great as the ones you normally get…
^But please, help us! We need to feed our family.

c-0: ^Yes… well, you see, we're not normal cats… we're of the domesticated kind! We’re terrible at chasing mice, so we’re starving…
c-1: ^Of course you can! But please don't touch Quellia, she would get very uncomfortable!

b: ^Thank you! You're our savior, this will feed us for weeks!
c: ^Come on! I could get a better price on the street… Wait, maybe we should try that!
d: ^Oh… I didn’t realize you were struggling too. I’m sorry.
e: ^Noo! I won’t forgive you! ... Wait, no... don’t pet me... okay, that’s nice…
f: ^Can’t you go just a bit higher? This is for our family!
g: ^That’s low. You don’t need to make excuses. Just say no if it’s no.
i: ^Okay, yes... it is just a normal slice of pizza. Il't take you on your offer, it's better than nothing I guess!
